section.title: How to report bugs
section.p: Please report bugs to bugzilla, the Apache bug database. A copy of your bug report is sent automatically to the discussion list fop-dev@xml.apache.org.
Please make sure, before you report a bug, that it is not mentioned in the FAQ or in the list of open bugs at bugzilla.
Please make your description as concise as possible and add an example fo file with your report, which just demonstrates the problem. Thanks for your help!

section.title: Known bugs
section.p: A list of known bugs can be found at bugzilla.
